text.section: The provisions of KRS 247.401 to 247.4027 are severable. If any part of KRS 247.401 to 247.4027 is declared invalid or unconstitutional, that declaration shall not affect the part which remains.
KRS 247.401 to 247.4027 shall apply only to causes of action which arise on or after July 15, 1996.

law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1996.
